sourcesContent:
<template>
  <d2-container>
     <template slot="header">
      <el-row :gutter="20">
      <el-col :span="8">搜索任务</el-col>
      <el-col :span="6" class="d2-text-center">
        <el-input v-model="input" placeholder="请输入" size="small"></el-input>
      </el-col>
      <el-col :span="6" style="cursor:pointer;margin-top:0px">
        <el-button icon="el-icon-search" type="primary" size="small" @click="getlist()">搜索</el-button>
      </el-col>
      <el-col :span="2" class="d2-text-center" style="cursor:pointer;">我要发布</el-col>
      <el-col :span="2" class="d2-text-center" style="cursor:pointer;">我的任务</el-col>
    </el-row>
     </template>
    
    <work-list :data="formatData" class="work-list"></work-list>

    <template slot="footer">加载更多</template>
  </d2-container>
</template>

<script>
import WorkList from "@/components/worklist/workList";
import {GetWorkList} from "@/api/work/work";
import axios from 'axios';
// import axios from
export default {
  name: "page1",
  components: {
    WorkList
  },
  methods:{
    async getWorkLits(){
      const { data } = await axios.get('/api/task/query/all');
      // console.log(data);
      if(data.status == 200)
      this.formatData = data.data;
      console.log(this.formatData);
    }
   },
   created() {
     this.getWorkLits();
   },
  data() {
    return {
      input: "",
      formatData:""
    };
  }
};
</script>
<style lang ="less">
.el-col {
  border: 1px solid transparent;
}
</style>
